intro: Astrodendrum, commonly known as the star dendron, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Acanthaceae. It is native to tropical and subtropical regions of the Americas, particularly Central and South America. The plant typically features showy, tubular flowers that are often brightly colored, with a distinctive star-like appearance. Astrodendrum species are often grown as ornamental plants due to their striking floral display. They prefer warm, humid environments and are relatively easy to care for in suitable conditions.
